trans-unit.source: Exposes the public members of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> class to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 公開 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 類別的公用成員至 Unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此介面會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，而且不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This interface preserves the vtable order of the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會保留 vtable 順序的<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別可由 unmanaged COM 物件存取的成員。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 宣告這個成員之類別的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得宣告此成員的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.Equals(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Object.Equals(System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 和目前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會判斷是否指定<xref:System.Object>是否等於目前<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns all attributes applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回所有套用至這個成員的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Boolean)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains all the custom attributes, or an array with zero (0) elements if no attributes are defined.
trans-unit.target: 包含所有自訂屬性的陣列，如果沒有定義屬性，則為包含零 (0) 元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns an array containing all the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回陣列，其中包含的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Only attributes that are assignable to this type are returned.
trans-unit.target: 只會傳回可指派給這種類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetCustomAttributes(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetCustomAttributes(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An array of custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero (0) elements if no attributes have been applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用至這個成員的自訂屬性陣列，如果沒有套用屬性，則為包含零 (0) 元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns an array of custom attributes identified by <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回所識別的自訂屬性陣列<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法做為特定類型的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> 適用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: An array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: The count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應之名稱的計數。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

trans-unit.source: An array allocated by the caller that receives the identifiers corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 由呼叫端配置的陣列，接收對應於名稱的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetType" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetType" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method gets the type of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會取得目前的執行個體的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 類型資訊的地區設定識別項。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 所要求類型資訊物件的指標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含接收物件提供的類型資訊介面數目的位置指標。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件提供的類型資訊介面數目 (0 或 1)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the member.
trans-unit.target: 成員的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、具名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中元素數目的計數。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the location where the result will be stored.
trans-unit.target: 儲存結果的位置指標。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 包含例外狀況資訊之結構的指標。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一個有錯誤的引數索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object to which the custom attributes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用自訂屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instance of the <paramref name="attributeType" /> parameter is applied to this member; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果一或多個 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 參數的執行個體套用至這個成員，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A> method indicates whether one or more instances of the `attributeType` parameter are applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A>方法會指出是否的一或多個執行個體`attributeType`參數會套用至這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> values indicating the type of member.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> 值，指出成員的型別。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets a <xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes> value indicating the type of the member — method, constructor, event, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得<xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes>值，指出成員類型 — 方法、 建構函式、 事件等等。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object containing the name of this member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 物件，其中包含這個成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the name of the current member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得目前成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that was used to obtain this <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 用於取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性取得用來取得這個執行個體的類別物件<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。
